credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Fifteen sketches for a throne
description: Top row: two angle views and two plans of platforms with thrones. Center row: three elevation, a plan of platforms with thrones; the right part of an elevation suggests a parapet, another suggests a parapet and a niche behind the throne. Bottom: five side and front views suggesting pedestals with panopiles at the bottom of the steps; a plan; front view of the seat alone. Dark brown strip along the bottom edge.
name: Drawing
